headline.main: Stoner Scores 1st Goal of Season, Helps Ducks Top Stars 3-1
headline.print_headline: Stoner Scores 1st Goal of Season, Helps Ducks Top Stars 3-1

docs.snippet: Clayton Stoner scored the go-ahead goal in the third period with his first of the season, and the Anaheim Ducks beat the Dallas Stars 3-1 on Sunday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: Clayton Stoner scored the go-ahead goal in the third period with his first of the season, and the Anaheim Ducks beat the Dallas Stars 3-1 on Sunday night.

headline.main: Canadian Gets 7 Years in Jail in Nepal for Child Sex Abuse
headline.print_headline: Canadian Gets 7 Years in Jail in Nepal for Child Sex Abuse

docs.snippet: A Canadian tourist with several previous child sex convictions has been sentenced to seven years in prison in Nepal for sexually abusing a minor boy, the court said Monday....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Canadian tourist with several previous child sex convictions has been sentenced to seven years in prison in Nepal for sexually abusing a minor boy, the court said Monday.

headline.main: Hopes for Peaceful Russian Transition Fade With Nemtsov: Kasparov
headline.print_headline: Hopes for Peaceful Russian Transition Fade With Nemtsov: Kasparov

docs.snippet: The murder of Kremlin critic Boris Nemtsov has dampened any hope for a peaceful political transition in Russia away from President Vladimir Putin's government, Garry Kasparov, a prominent opposition voice, said in an interview on Sunday....
docs.lead_paragraph: The murder of Kremlin critic Boris Nemtsov has dampened any hope for a peaceful political transition in Russia away from President Vladimir Putin's government, Garry Kasparov, a prominent opposition voice, said in an interview on Sunday.

headline.main: NXP to Buy Freescale Semiconductor, Merge Operations in $40 Billion Deal
headline.print_headline: NXP to Buy Freescale Semiconductor, Merge Operations in $40 Billion Deal

docs.snippet: Chip maker NXP Semiconductors NV has agreed to buy smaller peer Freescale Semiconductor Ltd and merge operations in a deal valuing the combined company at over $40 billion (26 billion pounds) ....
docs.lead_paragraph: Chip maker NXP Semiconductors NV has agreed to buy smaller peer Freescale Semiconductor Ltd and merge operations in a deal valuing the combined company at over $40 billion (26 billion pounds) .

headline.main: Veteran Forward Cole Joins Red Wings From Stars
headline.print_headline: Veteran Forward Cole Joins Red Wings From Stars

docs.snippet: The Detroit Red Wings acquired veteran forward Erik Cole in a multi-player trade with the Dallas Stars on Sunday.    On the eve of Monday's NHL trade deadline, the Red Wings sent two prospects and a draft pick to the last-place Stars in exchange f...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Detroit Red Wings acquired veteran forward Erik Cole in a multi-player trade with the Dallas Stars on Sunday.    On the eve of Monday's NHL trade deadline, the Red Wings sent two prospects and a draft pick to the last-place Stars in exchange for Cole and a conditional 2015 third-round draft pick.    The 36-year-old Cole has 18 goals and 15 assists in 57 games this season. The Red Wings will be hoping his experience, 526 career points and 46 playoff games, will be valuable in the upcoming post-season.    Detroit (35-15-11) is currently third in the Atlantic Division, one point behind Tampa Bay.    Dallas, who entered Sunday at the bottom of the Central Division, received young defenseman Mattias Backman and center Mattias Janmark in the deal.

headline.main: Watson Critics Crank Up Heat After Latest False Start
headline.print_headline: Watson Critics Crank Up Heat After Latest False Start

headline.main: Los Angeles Police Shoot, Kill Man in Fight Caught on Video
headline.print_headline: Los Angeles Police Shoot, Kill Man in Fight Caught on Video

docs.snippet: Three Los Angeles police officers fired on and killed a man on the city's Skid Row during a struggle over one of the officers' guns, and authorities said they planned to use video captured by a bystander in their investigation....
docs.lead_paragraph: Three Los Angeles police officers fired on and killed a man on the city's Skid Row during a struggle over one of the officers' guns, and authorities said they planned to use video captured by a bystander in their investigation.

headline.main: Carter Sets Season Mark in Shot Put at US Champs
headline.print_headline: Carter Sets Season Mark in Shot Put at US Champs

docs.snippet: Michelle Carter unleashed the season's longest women's shot put throw at the U.S. indoor championships in Boston on Sunday, her mark of 19.45 meters on her final attempt capping a solid series that included two other throws over 19m....
docs.lead_paragraph: Michelle Carter unleashed the season's longest women's shot put throw at the U.S. indoor championships in Boston on Sunday, her mark of 19.45 meters on her final attempt capping a solid series that included two other throws over 19m.
